item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 23, 2024 at 4:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Consulting firms step up efforts to push out their low performers
2. Greece and Spain under pressure to provide Ukraine with air defence systems
3. Trump trial opens with allegations he tried to ‘corrupt’ 2016 US election
4. Tesla shareholders braced for worst results in 7 years
5. Goldman Sachs moves senior banker to Paris in post-Brexit revamp
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 23, 2024 at 4:25 AM UTC
